text: Ciara Quinn Bravo (born March 18, 1997 in Alexandria, Kentucky) is an American actress, singer, and voice actress. She is best known for her role in Big Time Rush as Katie Knight. Bravo is also known for voicing Giselita in Open Season 3 and Peaches in Ice Age: A Mammoth Christmas. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== * Big Time Audition - Katie Knight (2009) * Big Time Concert - (2010) * Big Time Christmas - (2010) * Open Season 3 - Giselita (2010) (voice) * Big Time Beach Party - Katie Knight (2011) * Happiness Is a Warm Blanket, Charlie Brown - Patty (2011) (voice) * My Dog's Christmas Miracle - Heather (2011) * Big Time Break-Up - Katie Knight (2011) ===Television=== ====2008==== * Can You Teach My Alligator Manners? - Additional Voices (voice) ====2009==== * Special Agent Oso - Sarah (voice) * The Cafeteria - Caroline (short) * Washed Up - Sarah * Big Time Rush - Katie Knight ====2011==== * Ice Age: A Mammoth Christmas - Peaches (TV special) (voice) * BrainSurge - Herself ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American pop musicians Category:Singers from Kentucky Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Kentucky Category:1997 births Category:Living people
title: Ciara Bravo
